4.6. oncilla.sliceReStructuredText¶

sliceReStructuredText.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
Slices given reStructuredText file.

Others:

4.6.2. Functions¶

oncilla.sliceReStructuredText.sliceReStructuredText(input, output)[source]¶

Slices given reStructuredText file.

Parameters:
  • input (unicode) – ReStructuredText file to slice.
  • output (unicode) – Directory to output sliced reStructuredText files.
Returns:

Definition success.

bool
